Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read or accessed through our Service.

telehealth.content: Telehealth services provided through our platform are subject to the limitations of technology. Technical problems or equipment failures may result in delays in medical evaluation or treatment. Telehealth may not be appropriate for all health conditions, and in-person consultation may be necessary.
